name: @scullyio/create-scully
description: functions for add and use Scully in vue or react project

scripts.publish:patch: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch:dist: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version patch && cp ./package.json ../../dist/add && cd ../../dist/add && npm publish --access=public

author: @scullyio
